LanguageData.AA_Ocular.label: ocular
LanguageData.AA_Ocular.description: A corrupted dryad afflicted by a bizarre extradimensional disease that causes gaping wounds to appear all over its body, from which ocular orbs slowly emerge. Ocular dryads can be further mutated into grotesque beasts by an Ocular Priest.
LanguageData.AA_Spitter.label: spitter
LanguageData.AA_Spitter.description: A dryad caste specialized in venomous ranged attacks. Their ranged attacks can be commanded directly, or ordered to attack on their own by their trainer.
LanguageData.AA_Unstable.label: unstable
LanguageData.AA_Unstable.description: A dangerous dryad caste that will ecplode with acid when dead. They can be commanded to explode... for the good of the tree.
LanguageData.AA_Corruptor.label: corruptor dryad
LanguageData.AA_Corruptor.description: A dryad caste with the unique ability to produce corrupted Gauranlen pods and reproduce the Gauranlen tree along with its symbiote, the dryad queen. To do this, three corruptor dryads must slowly merge.
